title: Larva
data:
The **larva**, **maggot**, and **dung worm** form a chain of related monsters added in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM").

## Larva

| w larva [![Larva.png](/images/4/4f/Larva.png)](/wiki/File:Larva.png) |          |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")**      | 2        |

|                                                                      |          |

| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | 2                                                                                                                |

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                                  |

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                                  |
| **[Frequency](/wiki/Monster_frequency "Monster frequency")** (by [normal means](/wiki/Normal_mechanism "Normal mechanism"))                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | 2 (Quite rare)                                                                                                   |

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                                  |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | sleep, poison                                                                                                    |

| A larva:* cannot pick up items.
* has no limbs.
* is an [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal").
* has a [serpent body](/wiki/Slithy "Slithy").
* [regenerates HP quickly](/wiki/Regeneration "Regeneration").
* is [poisonous](/wiki/Poisonous "Poisonous") to eat.
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is neither male nor female.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* wanders randomly.
* can [follow](/wiki/Follower "Follower") you to other levels.
* normally appears in small [groups](/wiki/Group "Group"). |                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                                  |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1704](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1704 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

A **larva**, w, is a [worm](/wiki/Worm "Worm") that appears in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"). This is among the easiest monsters to defeat. Its [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") is poisonous but has a small chance of granting [sleep resistance](/wiki/Sleep_resistance "Sleep resistance").

| A maggot:* can [hide under items](/wiki/Hiding "Hiding").
* cannot pick up items.
* has no limbs.
* is an [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal").
* has a [serpent body](/wiki/Slithy "Slithy").
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* normally appears in small [groups](/wiki/Group "Group"). |                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                                                  |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1714](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1714 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

A larva can grow up (down?) into a **maggot**, w. Unlike a larva, a maggot is neither poisonous to eat nor do they provide sleep resistance. They are also significantly smaller, weighing only 10 and also providing only 10 nutrition.

| A dung worm:* cannot pick up items.
* has no limbs.
* is an [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal").
* has a [serpent body](/wiki/Slithy "Slithy").
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* normally appears in small [groups](/wiki/Group "Group"). |                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                  |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1721](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1721 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

A larva can grow up into a **dung worm**, w, the final stage of the SLASH'EM worm growth chain. They are identical to the younger maggot apart from doing 1d4 damage instead of 1d3 and having a higher base level.

- *Page should probably be renamed. This page is a **[SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM")** related **[stub](/wiki/Category:SLASH%27EM_stubs "Category:SLASH'EM stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Larva\&action=edit)*
html:
Larva

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

The larva, maggot, and dung worm form a chain of related monsters added in SLASH'EM.

Larva

w larva
Difficulty 2
Attacks Bite 1d2
w larva
Difficulty 2
Attacks

Bite 1d2

Base level 1
Base experience 8
Speed 6
Base AC 9
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 2 (Quite rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 150
Nutritional value 100
Size Medium
Resistances sleep, poison
Resistances conveyed sleep (7%)

A larva:

  • cannot pick up items.
  • has no limbs.
  • is an animal.
  • has a serpent body.
  • regenerates HP quickly.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • wanders randomly.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • normally appears in small groups.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1704

A larva, w, is a worm that appears in SLASH'EM. This is among the easiest monsters to defeat. Its corpse is poisonous but has a small chance of granting sleep resistance.

Maggot

w maggot
Difficulty 3
Attacks Bite 1d3
w maggot
Difficulty 3
Attacks

Bite 1d3

Base level 2
Base experience 17
Speed 9
Base AC 5
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 2 (Quite rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 10
Nutritional value 10
Size Small
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A maggot:

  • can hide under items.
  • cannot pick up items.
  • has no limbs.
  • is an animal.
  • has a serpent body.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • normally appears in small groups.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1714

A larva can grow up (down?) into a maggot, w. Unlike a larva, a maggot is neither poisonous to eat nor do they provide sleep resistance. They are also significantly smaller, weighing only 10 and also providing only 10 nutrition.

Dung worm

w dung worm
Difficulty 4
Attacks Bite 1d4
w dung worm
Difficulty 4
Attacks

Bite 1d4

Base level 3
Base experience 28
Speed 9
Base AC 5
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 2 (Quite rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 10
Nutritional value 10
Size Small
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A dung worm:

  • cannot pick up items.
  • has no limbs.
  • is an animal.
  • has a serpent body.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • normally appears in small groups.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1721

A larva can grow up into a dung worm, w, the final stage of the SLASH'EM worm growth chain. They are identical to the younger maggot apart from doing 1d4 damage instead of 1d3 and having a higher base level.

Page should probably be renamed. This page is a SLASH'EM related stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Larva&oldid=81361"

The '''larva''', '''maggot''', and '''dung worm''' form a chain of related monsters added in [[SLASH'EM]].
== Larva ==
{{ monster
 |name=larva
 |difficulty=2
 |level=1
 |experience=8
 |speed=6
 |AC=9
 |MR=0
 |align=0
 |frequency=2
 |genocidable=Yes
 |attacks=Bite 1d2
 |resistances conveyed=sleep (7%)

 |size=Medium
 |nutr=100
 |weight=150
 |reference=[[SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1704]]
}}
A '''larva''', {{white|w}}, is a [[worm]] that appears in [[SLASH'EM]]. This is among the easiest monsters to defeat. Its [[corpse]] is poisonous but has a small chance of granting [[sleep resistance]].

{{clear}}

}}
A larva can grow up (down?) into a '''maggot''', {{white|w}}. Unlike a larva, a maggot is neither poisonous to eat nor do they provide sleep resistance. They are also significantly smaller, weighing only 10 and also providing only 10 nutrition.

A larva can grow up into a '''dung worm''', {{black|w}}, the final stage of the SLASH'EM worm growth chain. They are identical to the younger maggot apart from doing 1d4 damage instead of 1d3 and having a higher base level.
